name: DRW Holdings, LLC
goal: DRW is a global trading firm with more than 800 employees at seven offices worldwide. Our trading spans a wide range of asset classes, including futures, options, bonds, commodities, and equities currencies.
interests: Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: DRW initiatives are focused on an EU FinTech Action Plan.
